import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.svg' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' const Navbar = () => { const [ updateMenu, getMenuState ] = useContext(ShopContext); return (

SHOPPING ONLINE

  • {updateMenu("shop")}}>Home{{getMenuState}==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {updateMenu("men")}}>Men{menu==="men"?
    :<>}
  • {updateMenu("women")}}>Women{menu==="women"?
    :<>}
  • {updateMenu("kid")}}>Kids{menu==="kid"?
    :<>}
0
) } export default Navbar
